segments.text: Welcome to our International Business Counter . How can I help ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Hello . I'm trying to track down some documents due to arrive any day on our new L / C .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Not a problem . Could you tell me you L / C number , please ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: OK , just checking for you ... yes , they have arrived . How would you like me to handle them ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Would it be possible to transfer them to IBA Bank ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: That's fine . I'll get on with that for you right now .
segments.speaker: S1
